tool_description: Up-to-date and accurate information on visa requirements for any country, enabling efficient access to visa information for businesses, travel agencies, and individuals
name: Visa Requirements
title: Visa Requirements

api_list.name: /statuses
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://visa-requirements4.p.rapidapi.com/statuses"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "visa-requirements4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
